meanings.sent1: Grandma foretells that it will rain tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: The fortune teller foretells events that will happen next week.
meanings.sent3: The magic eight ball foretells a day full of surprises.
meanings.sent4: The ancient prophecy foretells a hero who will save the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The old book foretells the rise and fall of civilizations.

meanings.sent1: The dark clouds foretells a storm approaching.
meanings.sent2: The sudden drop in temperature foretells the arrival of winter.
meanings.sent3: The early morning traffic foretells a busy day ahead.
meanings.sent4: The teacher's stern look foretells trouble for the misbehaving student.
meanings.sent5: The warning signs foretells danger ahead on the road.
